name: entranced
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you are entranced by someone or something that is very interesting or beautiful, you cannot stop watching him, her, or it: entranced by The children sat silent on the carpet, entranced by the puppet show. Synonyms
charmed (PLEASED)
delighted
